channel.title: Docker on Tiny, and Perfect Programmer Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Docker on Tiny, and Perfect Programmer Blog

item.title: How to setup Redis easly for development using docker
item.description: Prerequisites Install Redis Prerequisites In order to install Redis using docker following requirements must be met: $ docker --version Docker version 18.06.0-ce, build 0ffa825 $ docker-compose --version docker-compose version 1.22.0, build f46880fe Install Redis Open terminal (Ctrl+Alt+t shortcut to open terminal), and navigate to path where you want to create docker compose project for Redis. Create docker-compose.yml file with following content. version: "3" services: redis: container_name: redis-4.
